eu_initiatives: The Registration, Authorization and Restriction of Chemicals, Classification and Labelling and Biocides
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: The Ethanol REACH Association has compiled the REACH joint submission dossiers for Ethanol, Vinasses and Fusel Oil, as well as organizing the SIEF Formation for these substances.
relevant_communication: Compilation and submission of REACH joint submission dossiers, including  CLP recommendation. Dialog with biocides consortia to harmonize information.
